EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for the Interest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for your interest. Please download your Whitepaper PaaS: Open for Business Whitepaper <http://www.pivotal.io/paas/white-paper/paas-open-for-business?src=Welcome%20Email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=APJ_welcome%20email%20offer_q42014>.
